changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.STAGING_EXCEPTION ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_STAGING_EXCEPTION_ID DEFAULT NEWID(), TASK_RUN_ID NVARCHAR(64) INDEX IX_STAGING_EXCEPTION_TASK_RUN_ID, PAYLOAD NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, EXCEPTION_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_STAGING_EXCEPTION_EXCEPTION_TIME DEFAULT GETUTCDATE(), CONSTRAINT PK_STAGING_EXCEPTION PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([ID]) )
